title: Not All Touches Are Created Equal, Sorry Amari, and the Sony Michel Pity Party | The Dantasy Football Podcast (Ep. 328)
description:
The Ringer's Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly offer up some “Initial Advice” on a few must-add running backs (02:00) before discussing this week’s waiver-wire fallout following the Amari Cooper trade (10:45). They wrap up the show with a debate about Alvin Kamara’s value among top fantasy running backs (26:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
